greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of an optimal stopping constant related to the Secretary problem.
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge University Press, 2003, Section 5.15, p. 362.
mathematica: NProduct[(1+2/k)^(1/(k+1)), {k, 1, Infinity}, NProductFactors -> 1000, WorkingPrecision -> 48] // RealDigits[#, 10, 40]& // First
results.author: _Jean-François Alcover_, May 20 2014
ext: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 06 2014
